backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and a public inquiry form with admin retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removed IMC sections, navigation updates, and cleanup tasks with associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend components and sections for the marketing site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Topâ€‘level React component composing the site header, sections, footer, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Inquiry form component with validation, submission logic, and success state UI.
frontend/src/components/sections/B2BSect: Marketing section for B2B partners showing benefits, core pillars, and a contact CTA with icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/BrandSt: Presents the brand story with three themed cards about nature, craftsmanship, and global impact.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact form section with introductory text and an InquiryForm component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, brand tagline, description, and buttons scrolling to contact or products.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Showcases product features, an image, and a card highlighting use cases for sustainable jute bags.
frontend/src/components/sections/Sustain: Highlights sustainability pillars and compliance details using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand text, quick navigation links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a submit inquiry mutation that calls the backend actor and invalidates inquiry queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables plus global styles and a jute-texture background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, OKLCH color mapping, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, goals, architectural notes, and existing feature definitions for the Vanaprana website.
